00023         public function DLList(){
00024                 //head and tail only points to the head and tail of the list,
00025                 //the list nodes does not point on head and tail! Hence, head and
00026                 //tail are not part of the list.
00027                 $this->head = new ListNode();
00028                 $this->tail = new ListNode();
00029                 $this->size = 0;
00030 
00031                 $this->shortcuts = array();
00032         }

00041         public function addAtPosition($index, &$object){
00042                 //checks if index is not out of bounds
00043                 if($index >= 0 && $index <= $this->size()-1){
00044                         $newNode = $this->getNewNode($object);
00045                         $nodeAtIndex = &$this->getNode($index);
00046 
00047                         //new node at head
00048                         if($index == 0){
00049                                 $newNode->setNext(&$nodeAtIndex);
00050                                 $nodeAtIndex->setPrevious(&$newNode);
00051                                 $this->head->setNext(&$newNode);
00052                         }
00053                         else //somewhere else in the list
00054                         $this->insertNodeInList(&$newNode, &$nodeAtIndex);
00055 
00056                         $this->size++;
00057 
00058                         // add a shortcut
00059                         $this->addShortcut($object);
00060                         // ~add a shortcut
00061 
00062                         return TRUE;
00063                 }else if($index === $this->size()){
00064                         // the element will be added after the last element
00065                         return $this->add($object);
00066                 }
00067 
00068                 return FALSE;
00069         }
00070 
00078         public function insertNodeInList(&$newNode, &$nodeAtIndex){
00079                 $previousNode = &$nodeAtIndex->getPrevious();
00080 
00081                 $newNode->setPrevious(&$previousNode);
00082                 $newNode->setNext(&$nodeAtIndex);
00083                 $nodeAtIndex->setPrevious(&$newNode);
00084                 $previousNode->setNext(&$newNode);
00085         }

00094         public function add(&$object){
00095                 $newNode = $this->getNewNode(&$object);
00096 
00097                 //A non empty list, mostly the case.
00098                 if(!$this->isEmpty()){
00099                         $previousNode = &$this->tail->getPrevious();
00100                         $previousNode->setNext(&$newNode);
00101                         $newNode->setPrevious(&$previousNode);
00102                 }
00103                 else //empty
00104                 $this->head->setNext(&$newNode);
00105 
00106                 $this->tail->setPrevious(&$newNode);
00107 
00108                 $this->size++;
00109 
00110                 // add a shortcut
00111                 $this->addShortcut($object);
00112                 // ~add a shortcut
00113                 return true;
00114         }

00139         public function get($index){
00140                 //if the list is noe empty, and the index is a legal number
00141                 if(!$this->isEmpty() && (($index >= 0) && ($index < $this->size()))){
00142                         if($index < ($this->size()/2)) //searches from head
00143                         $tmpNode = &$this->getNode($index);
00144                         else                                                                                    //searches from tail
00145                         $tmpNode = &$this->getNodeReversed($index);
00146 
00147                         return $tmpNode->getNodeValueByReference();
00148                 }
00149 
00150                 //index out of bounds.
00151                 return FALSE;
00152         }

00160         }

00168         public function removeAtIndex($index){
00169                 print ("Remove requested at index:".$index);
00170                 if(!$this->isEmpty() && ($index>=0 && $index<=($this->size()-1))){
00171                         $nodeToRemove = &$this->getNode($index);
00172                         switch($index){
00173                                 case 0: //removing head
00174                                         $nextNode = &$nodeToRemove->getNext();
00175                                         $nextNode->setPrevious(NULL);
00176                                         $this->head->setNext(&$nextNode);
00177                                         break;
00178                                 case ($this->size()-1):
00179                                         //removing tail
00180                                         $previousNode = &$nodeToRemove->getPrevious();
00181                                         $previousNode->setNext(NULL);
00182                                         $this->tail->setPrevious(&$previousNode);
00183                                         break;
00184                                 default:
00185                                         //gets the node before and after the deleted node
00186                                         $previousNode = &$nodeToRemove->getPrevious();
00187                                         $nextNode = &$nodeToRemove->getNext();
00188                                         //updates the references for the before and after node.
00189                                         $previousNode->setNext(&$nextNode);
00190                                         $nextNode->setPrevious(&$previousNode);
00191                                         break;
00192                         }
00193                         //compleatly removes the node
00194                         $nodeToRemove->setPrevious(NULL);
00195                         $nodeToRemove->setNext(NULL);
00196 
00197                         //decreases the size of the list.
00198                         $this->size--;
00199 
00200                         // remove the shortcut
00201                         $this->removeShortcut($nodeToRemove->element);
00202                         // ~remove the shortcut
00203                         return TRUE;
00204                 }
00205                 return FALSE;
00206         }
00207 
00215         public function remove($element){
00216                 if(!$this->isEmpty()){
00217                         $__node = &$this->head;
00218 
00219                         for($__i=0; $__i<$this->size(); $__i++){
00220                                 $__node = &$__node->getNext();
00221 
00222                                 if ( strcmp($__node->element->id, $element->id) === 0 ){
00223                                         $__previousNode = &$__node->getPrevious();
00224                                         $__nextNode = &$__node->getNext();
00225                                         //updates the references for the before and after node.
00226                                         $__previousNode->setNext(&$__nextNode);
00227                                         $__nextNode->setPrevious(&$__previousNode);
00228 
00229                                         if($__i === 0){
00230                                                 // the head should be set correctly
00231                                                 $this->head->setNext(&$__nextNode);
00232 
00233                                         }
00234 
00235                                         if($__i === $this->size()-1){
00236                                                 // the tail should be set correctly
00237                                                 $this->tail->setPrevious(&$__previousNode);
00238                                         }
00239                                         // remove the shortcut
00240                                         $this->removeShortcut($element);
00241                                         // ~remove the shortcut
00242 
00243                                         return true;
00244                                 }
00245                         }
00246                         return false;
00247                 }
00248         }

00255         public function &getNode($index){
00256                 //the list is not empty, and the index is not out of bounds
00257                 if(!$this->isEmpty() && (($index >= 0) && ($index < $this->size()))){
00258                         $tmpNode = &$this->head;
00259                         for($i=0; $i<=$index; $i++)
00260                         $tmpNode = &$tmpNode->getNext();
00261 
00262                         return $tmpNode;
00263                 }
00264                 return FALSE;
00265         }

00272         public function &getNodeReversed($index){
00273                 //the list is not empty, and the index is not out of bounds
00274                 if(!$this->isEmpty() && (($index >= 0) && ($index < $this->size()))){
00275                         $tmpNode = &$this->tail;
00276                         for($i=($this->size()-1); $i>=$index; $i--)
00277                         $tmpNode = &$tmpNode->getPrevious();
00278 
00279                         return $tmpNode;
00280                 }
00281                 return FALSE;
00282 
00283         }

00348         private function addShortcut(&$object){
00349                 foreach ($this->shortcuts as $__type){
00350                         if ( strcmp(get_class($object), $__type) === 0 ){
00351                                 $this->shortcuts[get_class($object)]->add($object);
00352                                 return true;
00353                         }
00354                 }
00355                 return false;
00356         }
00357 
00358         private function removeShortcut(&$object){
00359                 foreach ($this->shortcuts as $__type){
00360                         if ( strcmp(get_class($object), $__type) === 0 ){
00361                                 $this->shortcuts[get_class($object)]->remove($object);
00362                                 return true;
00363                         }
00364                 }
00365                 return false;
00366         }

00390         public function getPosition(POMElement $element){
00391                 $__currentPos = 0;
00392 
00393                 if(!$this->isEmpty()){
00394                         $__node = $this->head;
00395 
00396                         for($__i=0; $__i<$this->size(); $__i++){
00397                                 $__node = $__node->getNext();
00398 
00399                                 if ( strcmp($__node->element->id, $element->id) === 0 ){
00400                                         return $__currentPos;
00401                                 }
00402                                 $__currentPos++;
00403                         }
00404                 }
00405                 return -1;
00406         }

00427         public function DLListIterator(&$head, &$list){
00428                 // parent::Iterator(&$head, &$list);
00429                 $this->currentNode = $head;
00430                 $this->previousNode = $this->currentNode->getPrevious();
00431                 $this->nextNode = $this->currentNode->getNext();
00432 
00433                 $this->list = &$list;
00434         }

00440         public function hasNext(){
00441                 //current node must exist and be different from NULL OR next node exists.
00442                 return (($this->currentNode != NULL && $this->currentNode->getNext() != NULL) || $this->nextNode != NULL ? TRUE : FALSE);
00443         }
00444 
00451         public function &getNext(){
00452                 if($this->hasNext()){
00453                         //checks if current node is deleted.
00454                         if($this->currentNode != NULL)
00455                         $this->currentNode = $this->currentNode->getNext();
00456                         else
00457                         $this->currentNode = &$this->nextNode;
00458 
00459                         $this->previousNode = $this->currentNode->getPrevious();
00460                         $this->nextNode = $this->currentNode->getNext();
00461 
00462                         return $this->currentNode;
00463                 }
00464 
00465                 return NULL;
00466         }

00474         public function getNextNodeValue(){

00500                         if($this->currentNode != NULL)
00501                         $this->currentNode = $this->currentNode->getNext();
00502                         else

00519         public function remove(){
00520                 if($this->currentNode->getPrevious() == NULL)
00521                 $this->list->removeObjectAtIndex(0);
00522                 else
00523                 if($this->currentNode->getNext() == NULL)
00524                 $this->list->removeObjectAtIndex(($this->list->size()-1));
00525                 else{
00526                         //updates the references for the before and after the current node.
00527                         $this->previousNode->setNext(&$this->nextNode);
00528                         $this->nextNode->setPrevious(&$this->previousNode);
00529                         $this->list->decSize();
00530                 }
00531                 $this->currentNode->setNext(NULL);
00532                 $this->currentNode->setPrevious(NULL);
00533                 $this->currentNode = NULL;
00534         }
00535 
00540         public function hasPrevious(){
00541                 //it has a previous value if $this->previous != NULL or current node is set an has a previous value set.
00542                 return (($this->currentNode != NULL && $this->currentNode->getPrevious() != NULL) || $this->previousNode != NULL ? TRUE : FALSE);
00543         }
00544 
00549         public function &getPrevious(){
00550                 if($this->hasPrevious()){
00551                         $this->currentNode = &$this->currentNode->getPrevious(); //current is the node between previous and next
00552                         $this->previousNode = &$this->currentNode->getPrevious(); //previous is the node closer to head
00553                         $this->nextNode = &$this->currentNode->getNext(); //next is the node closer to tail
00554 
00555                         return $this->currentNode->getNodeValueByReference();
00556                 }
00557 
00558                 return FALSE;
00559         }

00648 class POMDataUtil{
00649         public static function toArray($data){
00650                 if(!is_object($data) && !is_array($data))
00651                 {
00652                         return $data;
00653                 }
00654                 if(is_object($data)){
00655                         $data = get_object_vars($data);
00656                 }
00657 
00658                 return array_map('POMDataUtil::toArray', $data);
00659         }
